<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=5874) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You fail or critically fail an attack roll or Will save.

</column>

---

You burn out all your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free. Reroll the triggering attack roll or Will save with a +2 circumstance bonus, and use the better result. You then immediately stop raging.
name: Perfect Clarity
